snippet: Richard Schulze said he was leaving the board immediately and that he was looking to sell his 20.1 percent stake in the retailer, worth about $1.3 billion.
abstract: Best Buy founder Richard Schulze says he is leaving the board immediately and is looking to sell his 20.1 percent stake in the retailer, worth about $1.3 billion.
lead_paragraph: Richard Schulze said he was leaving the board immediately and that he was looking to sell his 20.1 percent stake in the retailer, worth about $1.3 billion.

headline.seo: Schulze, Best Buy’s Chairman, to Leave Ahead of Schedule
headline.print_headline: Best Buy Chairman Leaving Early; Looks to Sell Stake
